name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-skype-status
title: Skype Status Web Part
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use the UCWA JS SDK for skype with the SharePoint Framework. It shows how to subscribe to status change of the different people of the organization but you can get much more information, checkout the documentation
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use the UCWA JS SDK for skype with the SharePoint Framework. It shows how to subscribe to status change of the different people of the organization but you can get much more information, checkout the documentation

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
